titles.title: Accept Chinese Talent Now Act
To amend the Chinese Student Protection Act of 1992 to eliminate the offset in per country numerical level required under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/31/2009--Introduced. Accept Chinese Talent Now Act - Amends the Chinese Student Protection Act of 1992 to eliminate the provision requiring the reduction of annual People's Republic of China (PRC) immigrant visas to offset status adjustments under such Act.
